All [L] trains at 1 Av and 3 Av board from the Brooklyn-bound platform

alerts.humanReadableActivePeriod: Tue and Thu, 1:30 AM to 5:00 AM until Dec 29

alerts.alertHeaderText: No [L] trains between Broadway Junction and Lorimer St
alerts.alertDescriptionText:
[L] service runs in two sections:
1. Between Canarsie-Rockaway Pkwy and Broadway Junction every 10 minutes until approximately 12:00 AM
2. Between Lorimer St and 8 Av every 12 minutes until approximately 1:00 AM

shuttle bus icon Free shuttle buses make stops between Broadway Junction and Lorimer St.
Transfer between trains and shuttle bus icon buses at Broadway Junction and/or Lorimer St.
For service between Brooklyn and Manhattan, consider the [A] or [J].
Transfer between trains and shuttle bus icon buses at Broadway Junction.
Note: All trains at Lorimer St board from the Manhattan-bound platform.

What's happening?
Track maintenance

accessibility icon This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations and these travel alternatives may not be fully accessible. Please contact 511 to plan your trip.
